description: Take advantage of vibrant spring produce with this easy pasta recipe. Ready in only 20 minutes, this dish is perfect for speedy weeknight dinners.
name: Prawn & Spring Greens Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add lemon juice, reserved cooking liquid and remaining oil, then cook for 1 minute or until heated through. Add prawn mixture to pasta, season and toss to combine. Divide pasta among bowls, scatter over zest and basil, and serve with extra lemon.
